name: Instinct (itch) (NightZard Productions)
description:
We are the Bushman of the Kalahari. Our ancestors have been living in the Kalahari desert for over 20,000 years.  We are some of the oldest people on earth. The women collect plants, fruit, insects, and ostrich shells, whilst us men hunt animals using a bow and arrow. I need your help hunting animals and collecting wood to upgrade my bow. Can you help us?

This game was created for a school project. It has many issues, but I am still quite proud of this one. This won't be receiving any updates in the future.

Key Features
  • Platform over 10 levels with breathtaking pixel art visuals! 
  • 4 Difficulties to play which will dramatically change the gaming experience!
  • Upgrade your bow and become the strongest man alive!
  • Learn about the Bushman of the Kalahari!
  • Kill animals!
  • Escape intense situations!
  • Discover secret areas!
